locked.title: Game Ended
locked.description: This puzzle has already been played. Check the menu for random or past games.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

reset.title: Reset Memory
reset.description: Clear all saved game data and history.
reset.confirm: Are you sure? This will permanently delete all game data and generate a new player ID. This cannot be undone.

gamePrompts.helpPrompt: Not sure how this works? Check the menu.

instructions.title: How to Play
instructions.description: Guess the 5-color combo in 6 tries. The colors in the combination can not repeat.

feedback.intro: After submitting, you'll get feedback on each color:
feedback.correct: If the full color is shown, it's in the correct position.
feedback.present: If half the color is shown, it's in the combo but wrong position.
feedback.absent: If fully grayed out, it's not in the combo.

howTo.selectColors: Use the color buttons below the board to select colors for your guess. Click "Submit Guess" when ready.

messages.solved: You solved the puzzle in {attempts} attempts!

pastPuzzles.title: Past Puzzles
pastPuzzles.description: Select a date to play a past puzzle.

whatIs.question: What is Shadle?
whatIs.answer: Shadle is a color-guessing game inspired by Wordle. Guess the 5-color combination in 6 tries. Colors cannot repeat in the combination.

gameModes.question: What are the different game modes?
gameModes.daily: The same new puzzle every day for everyone to play.
gameModes.past: Choose and play any past daily puzzle.

statistics.question: How are statistics tracked?
statistics.answer: Your game history is stored on the server and associated with your player ID. They are used to calculate statistics such as games played, win rate, current and best streaks. You can view them in the menu under "My Stats".

pwa.question: Is there a mobile app?
pwa.answer: Sort of! Shadle is a Progressive Web App (PWA), so you can install it directly from your browser by tapping "Add to Home Screen." It'll work just like a native app once installed.

themes.question: Can I play in different themes?
themes.answer: Yes! Shadle supports multiple color themes: Default, Colorblind-friendly, Retro, and Blues. You can change themes in the Settings menu.

affiliation.question: Is Shadle affiliated with Wordle?
affiliation.answer: No! Shadle is an independent project inspired by Wordle, but not affiliated with it in any way.
